Package xxl.core.predicates

This package provides Predicates.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetaDataPredicate<P,M>
    A marker interface for predicates providing metadata.
    Predicate<P>
    This interface provides a predicate, i.e. a kind of function that implements a logical statement and, when it is invoked, determines whether specified objects fulfill the statement.
    PredicateFunctional.BinaryPredicate<I0,I1>  
    PredicateFunctional.NullaryPredicate  
    PredicateFunctional.TrinaryPredicate<I0,I1,I2>  
    PredicateFunctional.UnaryPredicate<I>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMetaDataPredicate<P,M>
    An abstract implementation of the interface MetaDataPredicate that extends the class AbstractPredicate.
    AbstractPredicate<P>
    This class provides an abstract implementation of the interface Predicate.
    AllPredicate<P>
    This class provides a prototypical implementation of the all-predicate.
    And<P>
    This class provides a logical AND predicate.
    AnyPredicate<P>
    This class provides a prototypical implementation of the any-predicate.
    BinaryPredicate<P>
    This class provides a higher-order predicate (in other words, this predicate decorates two input predicates).
    BindingPredicate<P>
    This class provides a predicate whose arguments are partially bound to some constant objects.
    ComparatorBasedEqual<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the specified comparator returns 0.
    ComparatorPredicate<P>
    This abstract class provides a predicate that uses an underlying comparator for determining whether it is fulfilled or not.
    CountingPredicate<P>
    A DecoratorPredicate that provides additional information about calls, hits, and misses to its inner predicate.
    DecoratorPredicate<P>
    The class provides a decorator for a predicate that follows the Decorator Design Pattern (for further details see Structural Patterns, Decorator in Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software by Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, and John Vlissides).
    DistanceWithin<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether the distance between two given objects is less or equal a given epsilon distance.
    Equal<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments are equal.
    EqualReference<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments have the same reference.
    EveryNth<P>
    This class provides an unary predicate that returns a boolean value for every n-th argument.
    ExistPredicate<P>
    This class provides a prototypical implementation of the exist-predicate.
    FeaturePredicate<P,R>
    This class provides a decorator predicate that applies a mapping to the arguments of the underlying predicate.
    FunctionPredicate<P>
    This class provides a wrapper that wraps a function to a predicate.
    Greater<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is greater than the second.
    GreaterEqual<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is greater than or equal to the second.
    Indicator<P>
    Implements an indicator for a given collection.
    InputStreamEqualPredicate
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the input stream given as the first argument is equal to the second.
    LeftBind<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate which left (first) argument is bound to a constant object.
    Less<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is less than the second.
    LessEqual<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that returns true if the first given argument is less than or equal to the second.
    MultiFeaturePredicate<P,R>
    This class provides a decorator predicate that applies a fixed number number of mapping functions to the arguments of the underlying predicate.
    Not<P>
    This class provides a logical NOT predicate.
    NotEqual<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate that determines whether two given arguments are equal.
    Or<P>
    This class provides a logical OR predicate.
    PredicateFunctional  
    PredicateMetaDataPredicate<P,M>
    This abstract class provides a wrapper for a given predicate that provides additional meta data.
    Predicates
    This class provides static methods for the straightforward creation of predicates.
    ProjectionPredicate<P>
    This class provides a decorator predicate that applies a projection to the arguments of the underlying predicate.
    RightBind<P>
    This class provides a binary predicate which right (second) argument is bound to a constant object.
    Xor<P>
    This class provides a logical XOR predicate.

Package xxl.core.predicates Description

This package provides Predicates. Predicates are fundamental for many other classes of XXL.
